title: Preacher

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Preach to a player at night, ome time use.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- A player who has been preached to will be converted to a Town Power role the next night.
- If you preach at a townie's house, you will die.
- If you preach at an Evil faction's house, they will be converted to a Town Power.
- An evil player who has been converted cannot reveal their old teammates publicly, or else they will be modkilled.
